results.name: default/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-785cc896c5-5s2l8], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service lacks ready endpoints because the specified pod is not ready.  
Solution: 1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`. 2. Inspect pod details using `kubectl describe pod wordpress-785cc896c5-5s2l8`. 3. Resolve any issues found, such as image errors or readiness probe failures. 4. Ensure the pod becomes ready.

results.name: default/wordpress-785cc896c5-5s2l8

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.
